patthana16.16:4.1: Kusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:4.2: Kusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:4.3: Kusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:4.4: Kusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto ca naabyākato nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:4.5: Kusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.16:5.1: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:5.2: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:5.3: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:5.4: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naabyākato nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:5.5: Akusalaṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana16.16:6.1: Abyākataṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:6.2: Abyākataṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nacitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:6.3: Abyākataṃ cittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nacitto ca naakusalo nacitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.16:7.1: Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate terasa.
patthana16.16:8.1: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:8.2: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:8.3: Kusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nanocitto ca naabyākato nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.16:9.1: Akusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:9.2: Akusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato nanocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.16:9.3: Akusalaṃ nocittaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo nanocitto ca naabyākato nanocitto ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana16.16:11.1: Hetuyā nava … pe … vipāke tīṇi … pe … avigate nava.
